sentences.english: The book was quickly brandished by the left as vindication of social democracy.
sentences.chinese: 左翼分子聞風而動，攻擊該書宣揚社會民主主義。

sentences.english: The left-leaning La Repubblica said it was a "reckless comment."
sentences.chinese: 左翼的《共和報》稱這是“魯莽的言論”。

sentences.english: " The left-leaning La Repubblica said it was a "reckless comment.
sentences.chinese: 左翼的《共和報》稱這是“魯莽的言論”。

sentences.english: The views of the left wing have tended to predominate within the party.
sentences.chinese: 左翼的觀點趨向於在該黨黨內佔支配地位。

sentences.english: Zhuang concubine is a famous person of history.
sentences.chinese: 莊妃是歷史名人，而且是科爾沁左翼中旗人。

sentences.english: I sell to leftist and rightist.
That provoked grumbling among the left wing of the Democrats.
sentences.chinese: 這激起了在民主黨左翼人士間的不滿。

sentences.english: Next week he should dare to make himself much more unpopular on the left.
sentences.chinese: 下週，他應該敢於讓自己在左翼人士中更加不受歡迎。

sentences.english: The euro is off-limits for the European left.
sentences.chinese: 對歐洲左翼來說，歐元是討論的禁區。

sentences.english: He flew and used his left wing to hit Kira.
sentences.chinese: 俯衝並用左翼攻擊吉良。

sentences.english: Watch what happens all of you left wing alarmists and thugs.
sentences.chinese: 看看什麼即將發生吧，你們這羣大驚小怪的左翼混蛋。

sentences.english: The Left-wing Literary Movement started in the 1930's.
sentences.chinese: 二十世紀三十年代，左翼文藝運動興起。

sentences.english: Our company made a sudden charge on the left wing of the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我們連對敵人左翼發動了突襲。

sentences.english: This was the context in which the left came to power.
sentences.chinese: 這便是左翼政黨當權時的時代背景。

sentences.english: The commander concentrated a powerful force on the left flank.
sentences.chinese: 司令員把強大兵力集中在左翼。

definition: a front (militant group)/line of battle/alignment (towards a political party etc)
to conspire/to plot (a rebellion, crime etc)/to machinate/to spur on/to urge action
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to provide support/to come to the rescue
pincer attack/attack from two or more sides/converging attack/attack on a flank/fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks
